attributes.action: Make the government start action 50 before October 2016.
attributes.additional_details: The EU have stated they want action 50 started straight away and so does the voters that wanted to move away from the EU . So I'm asking the government to start the process before October 2016 and start action 50 now .
attributes.background: After the referendum to leave the EU we have been told that Mr Cameron will not activate action 50 and that it could take till October to start . Both the EU and the voters want action 50 started . So with this I ask the government to hear the voice of Great Britain.
